Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI can provide me feedback at any time compared to my teacher. Also, AI will not get upset at the amount of questions I have for it.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Both GenAI and my teacher made me feel grateful. AI can provide long and thorough feedback, teachers usually only write a small comment.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response:
AI: Immediate feedback, and no risk of bias as AI doesn't know who I am.
Teacher: Long wait times, and possibility of bias as teachers can identify students based on Student IDs, emails, etc.
